description: Validates the specified pipeline and starts processing pipeline tasks. If the pipeline does not pass validation, activation fails. If you need to pause the pipeline to investigate an issue with a component, such as a data source or script, call  DeactivatePipeline. To activate a finished pipeline, modify the end date for the pipeline and then activate it.

parameters.name: parameterValues
parameters.description: A list of parameter values to pass to the pipeline at activation. (dict) --- A value or list of parameter values. The ID of the parameter value. The field value, expressed as a String.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The ID of the parameter value.

nested_params.name: stringValue
nested_params.description: The field value, expressed as a String.
